comments.body:
the issue with Checkstyle is fixed in MCHECKSTYLE-244

the problem was not in plexus-resources, but in the LicenseResouceManager extension created by maven-checkstyle-plugin: it was not declared as instantiation-strategy="per-lookup" as it should have been (like FileResourceLoader and others from plexus-resources)
